hero.title: Discover Inmobo
hero.subtitle: Find the perfect place for your vacation

home.title: Discover Inmobo
home.subtitle: The best accommodations and experiences in Mexican paradise

hero.subtitle: Manage properties, capture leads, process reservations and payments, and analyze your performance — all from a single platform designed for the real estate professional.

features.sectionSubtitle: We connect you with the best properties
features.description: Inmobo is a complete real estate CRM that centralizes all your business operations: from property publishing to closing sales, including lead management, reservations, and collections.

trust.title: Trust and transparency
trust.description: Every listing is reviewed to ensure accuracy and quality.

fast.title: Fast and simple
fast.description: Find your ideal property in minutes with smart search.

experience.title: Unique experiences
experience.description: From beachfront villas to urban apartments, for every lifestyle.

quality.title: Premium quality
quality.description: Only curated properties that meet our standards.

investment.title: Investment opportunities
investment.description: Properties with high appreciation potential and solid returns.

support.title: Personalized support
support.description: Expert guidance throughout the entire process.

feature1.title: Property Management
feature1.desc: Register, edit and organize all your properties in one place with images, amenities and custom details.

feature2.title: Lead CRM
feature2.desc: Automatically capture leads from your public site, track their interest and convert prospects into clients.

feature3.title: Reservations
feature3.desc: Complete reservation system with calendar, automatic confirmations and availability management.

feature4.title: Integrated Payments
feature4.desc: Accept payments with Stripe and MercadoPago. Generate automatic vouchers and keep up-to-date financial control.

feature5.title: Real-Time Analytics
feature5.desc: Dashboard with metrics on visits, reservations, income and performance of each property.

feature6.title: Team & Permissions
feature6.desc: Invite your team with specific roles and permissions. Control who can view, edit or manage.

allInOne.title: Stop using
allInOne.description: With Inmobo you centralize all your real estate business information. You no longer need to jump between 10 different tools — everything is integrated and synchronized in real time.
allInOne.list1: Secure data in the cloud with Appwrite

howItWorks.sectionSubtitle: Find your perfect property in simple steps

step1.title: Search and explore
step1.desc: Browse our catalog and use filters to find properties that match your criteria.
step1.description: Browse our catalog and use filters to find properties that match your criteria.

step2.title: Contact and visit
step2.desc: Connect directly with agents and schedule visits at your convenience.
step2.description: Connect directly with agents and schedule visits at your convenience.

step3.title: Close the deal
step3.desc: Receive leads, reservations and payments automatically. Analyze your performance and scale your business.
step3.description: We support you through the entire closing process with secure documentation.

step4.title: Enjoy your new home
step4.description: Move into your ideal property and enjoy the lifestyle you deserve.

socialProof.title: Designed to scale
socialProof.subtitle: Tools designed for the modern real estate professional

finalCta.badge: Start for free, no credit card required
finalCta.title: Ready to transform your
finalCta.subtitle: Join the professionals who already manage their properties, leads and collections with Inmobo.

showcase.title: Power for every
showcase.subtitle: From property acquisition to closing deals, Inmobo gives you the tools to manage every step of your operation with precision.

400.title: Bad Request
400.subtitle: Something went wrong with your request
400.message: The request could not be processed. Please check the information and try again.

403.title: Access Denied
403.subtitle: You don't have permission to access this resource
403.message: This page is restricted. You need proper permissions to view this content.
tips: Check if you have the proper permissions
Contact support if you believe this is an error

404.title: Page Not Found
404.subtitle: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist
404.message: The page you requested could not be found. It might have been moved or deleted.

500.title: Server Error
500.subtitle: Oops! Something went wrong on our end
500.message: We're experiencing technical difficulties. Our team has been notified and is working on it.
tips: Try again in a few minutes
Contact support if the problem persists

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.subtitle: The service is temporarily unavailable
503.message: We're performing maintenance or experiencing high traffic. Please try again shortly.
tips: Wait a few minutes and try again
Follow us on social media for updates

general.title: Oops! Something Went Wrong
general.subtitle: An unexpected error occurred
general.message: We encountered an unexpected problem. Please try again.

errors.footerSupport: If the problem persists, please contact our support team.

privacyPage.title: Privacy notice
privacyPage.intro: This document summarizes how we process your personal data within the platform. The final legal version may vary by client and jurisdiction.

data.title: Data we collect
data.body: We collect account, profile, reservation, payment, and activity data to operate the service securely.

usage.title: How data is used
usage.body: We use your data to authenticate access, confirm reservations, issue vouchers, prevent fraud, and improve experience.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.body: You can request access, correction, or deletion of your data according to applicable laws and the service provider agreement.

termsPage.title: Terms and conditions
termsPage.intro: These terms define platform usage rules for guests, hosts, and internal operators.

access.title: Access and accounts
access.body: You must keep your account secure and provide truthful information. Unauthorized use may result in suspension.

reservations.title: Reservations and payments
reservations.body: Reservations depend on availability, payment confirmation, and each property's cancellation policies.

liability.title: Liability
liability.body: Final contractual and operational liability may belong to the instance provider according to its legal configuration.

homePage.catalogSubtitle: Explore available properties for sale, rent, and vacation rental.
homePage.emptyFiltered: No properties found for these filters.

wizard.hint: Complete each step to create a resource with real-time validation.
wizard.title: Create resource
wizard.draftNoticeBody: Review the information before saving. You can publish your resource later from the edit panel.

steps.typeAndInfoDesc: Set resource type, commercial mode, and core listing details.
steps.locationDesc: Select the resource location and address.
steps.featuresDesc: Detail the physical characteristics of the resource.
steps.pricingDesc: Set the price and economic conditions.
steps.imagesDesc: Add photos, video and virtual tour.
steps.commercialConditionsDesc: Define offer conditions based on the selected commercial mode.

wizard.noSpecificFeatures: This resource type does not require additional features in this step.
wizard.noDataCaptured: No data has been captured in this section yet.

placeholders.title: Example: Oceanfront villa with pool in Puerto Vallarta
placeholders.description: Describe location, standout features, ideal guest profile, and nearby services.

commercialConditionsHint.longTerm: Set contract conditions for medium and long-term rentals.
commercialConditionsHint.shortTerm: Configure stay and operating rules for date-based bookings.
commercialConditionsHint.hourly: Configure booking windows and limits for hourly/event offers.

wizard.noSpecificCommercialConditions: This resource type does not require additional commercial conditions.

tabs.helper: You can switch between sections and save when finished.
tabs.hint: In edit mode you can update only the needed section and save at the end.

editor.confirmLeaveUnsaved: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to leave and discard them?

helper.description: At least 20 characters. Explain value, location, and key highlights.
helper.pricingModel: Choose how pricing is charged for the selected resource type and commercial mode.
helper.categoryCommercialDifference: Use Commercial for classic real-estate sale/rent listings. For bookable spaces by hour, use resource type Venue and category Commercial unit.

note.title: Backend Enforcement
note.body: create-lead: module.resources + module.leads + module.messaging.realtime. create-reservation-public: module.resources + module.booking.* + module.payments.online. create-payment-session: module.resources + module.booking.* + module.payments.online.

rootModulesPage.title: Modules & Plan
rootModulesPage.subtitle: Control enabled modules and commercial limits of the instance.

note.title: Backend enforcement required
note.body: Module toggles must be reflected in Appwrite Functions with 403 MODULE_DISABLED block.

modulesModal.title: Configure Plan & Modules
modulesModal.description: Manage enabled modules and limits of the instance.

note.title: Backend enforcement required
note.body: Module toggles must be reflected in Appwrite Functions with 403 MODULE_DISABLED block.
